title: HELP! How much, can it be done, and who wants to do it?
content:
I want to reverse the colors of the below logo. I want the lettering to be white and the surrounding color to be that blue (well really, I want the surrounding color to be transparent, but the specific blue will do). I don’t know if it can be done and I don’t have a lot of money. I’ve tried to locate the exact font, but to no avail. The “e” and the “r” are never correct. Avant garde gothic pro book is the closest I’ve been able to come.

I understand that all you designers out there will rate this logo bad to poor. Regardless, I’m stuck with it for the meantime. Sorry.

Any help is greatly appreciated,

Cameron

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080927033740im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_6510.JPG)

 [‹ What kind of Times...?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080927033740/http:/typophile.com/node/49895 "Go to previous forum topic") [Bold for Asian Fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080927033740/http:/typophile.com/node/49882 "Go to next forum topic")
author: camwel

comments.content:
I’d be willing to help out. Just need to know a few things. feel free to email me and we can discuss it.

[simon@gonedesign.com](mailto:simon@gonedesign.com)

JH
